original_title: Julia & Romeo - Liebe ist ein Schlachtfeld
overview: A fanatical Nazi colonel holds a terrible secret weapon in his hands and can be stopped at the last second by a Russian spyka. Their blitzkrieg love results in two children, Romeo and Juliet, who grow up under fundamentally different ideologies. And while mad scientist Romeo tries to find the formula for his father's chemical weapon, it's up to big-breasted Juliet to stop the Nazi threat!
title: Julia & Romeo - Liebe ist ein Schlachtfeld
